name: The Dog
image: A faithful dog sitting attentively, eyes on its person. Loyal, trusting, waiting. It doesn't question—it stays. The most reliable creature in the deck.
as_person: A loyal friend, a devoted companion, a trustworthy person. Someone who shows up. A counselor, a therapist, or someone who provides unconditional support. The friend you call at 3 AM.

modifier_behavior.as_modifier: Adds loyalty, friendship, trust, or devoted support to the card it touches. Whatever is next to the Dog becomes reliable, friendly, or backed by someone faithful.
modifier_behavior.as_modified: The card's core meaning becomes the context for friendship, loyalty, or trust. What was uncertain becomes reliable. What was alone gains a companion.

topic_contexts.love: Faithful love, a devoted partner, loyalty in relationship. The love that stays. Friendship turning to romance. A relationship built on trust more than passion.
topic_contexts.career: A loyal colleague, a supportive work environment, a trusted professional ally. The coworker who has your back. Team loyalty.
topic_contexts.health: Support in healing, therapy, a faithful health companion (therapy dog, support group). Emotional health through friendship. The healing power of being believed.
topic_contexts.finances: Financial loyalty, a trusted advisor, money between friends. Loans to friends (careful). Reliable financial support.
topic_contexts.spiritual: Spiritual companionship, a faithful practice, devotion as a path. The divine as friend rather than judge. Unconditional spiritual support.

line_reading.as_first: The situation opens with friendship, loyalty, or trust. A devoted person or reliable energy sets the stage. Someone has your back.
line_reading.as_middle: Friendship or loyalty enters the picture. A trusted ally appears, or trust becomes the central issue. The dog arrives when needed.
line_reading.as_last: The outcome involves loyalty, friendship, or trustworthy support. Resolution comes through devotion. Someone stays.

combination_grammar.description: Fallback rules for combinations not explicitly listed.
combination_grammar.as_card_a: When The Dog appears BEFORE (left of) another card, it adds loyalty, friendship, or trust to Card B. Whatever Card B represents has a faithful ally. Think: 'a loyal [Card B]' or 'a friend in [Card B].'
combination_grammar.as_card_b: When The Dog appears AFTER (right of) another card, Card A's energy leads to friendship, trust, or loyalty. Think: '[Card A] leads to trust' or '[Card A] creates friendship.' Card A finds a friend.
combination_grammar.with_positive_card: Loyal blessings, trusted joy, friendship amplified. The good thing has a faithful companion. Double warmth.
combination_grammar.with_negative_card: Loyalty tested, friendship under strain, trust in a difficult context. The dog stays even in the storm—but at what cost?
combination_grammar.with_person_card: That person is a friend, is loyal, or relates to the querent through trust and devotion. They're the one who stays.
combination_grammar.with_object_card: That thing or concept is reliable, trustworthy, or connected to friendship. It's the thing you can count on.

grand_tableau.as_house: The House of Friendship — Cards landing here speak to loyalty, trust, friendship, and devoted companionship in the querent's life. This house asks: who is loyal? Where is the trust?
grand_tableau.near_significator: Friendship is central. The querent is surrounded by loyal companions or trust is the key issue. A faithful person is close.
grand_tableau.far_from_significator: Friendship is distant. Trust isn't the focus, or loyal companions are far. The dog waits in another yard.
grand_tableau.diagonal_or_corner: Loyalty operates quietly—a friend in the background, trust building slowly, or faithful support the querent hasn't fully acknowledged.
